argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_elex | |- ( F e. V -> F e. _V ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F e. V /\ G e. W ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elex | |- ( G e. W -> G e. _V ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( F e. V /\ G e. W ) -> G e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_dmexg | |- ( F e. V -> dom F e. _V ) |
| 6 |  | #P_inex1g | |- ( dom F e. _V -> ( dom F i^i dom G ) e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( ( dom F i^i dom G ) e. _V -> ( x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_3syl | |- ( F e. V -> ( x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( F e. V /\ G e. W ) -> ( x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( a = F -> dom a = dom F ) |
| 11 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( b = G -> dom b = dom G ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ineqan12d | |- ( ( a = F /\ b = G ) -> ( dom a i^i dom b ) = ( dom F i^i dom G ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( a = F -> ( a ` x ) = ( F ` x ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( b = G -> ( b ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_oveqan12d | |- ( ( a = F /\ b = G ) -> ( ( a ` x ) R ( b ` x ) ) = ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_mpteq12dv | |- ( ( a = F /\ b = G ) -> ( x e. ( dom a i^i dom b ) |-> ( ( a ` x ) R ( b ` x ) ) ) = ( x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_df-of | |- oF R = ( a e. _V , b e. _V |-> ( x e. ( dom a i^i dom b ) |-> ( ( a ` x ) R ( b ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_ovmpt2ga | |- ( ( F e. _V /\ G e. _V /\ ( x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) e. _V ) -> ( F oF R G ) = ( x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 2, 4, 9, 18 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( F e. V /\ G e. W ) -> ( F oF R G ) = ( x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) ) |
